description:
Manages a [Log Profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/monitoring-and-diagnostics/monitoring-overview-activity-logs#export-the-activity-log-with-a-log-profile). A Log Profile configures how Activity Logs are exported.

-> **NOTE:** It's only possible to configure one Log Profile per Subscription. If you are trying to create more than one Log Profile, an error with `StatusCode=409` will occur.

Days.description: The number of days for the retention policy. Defaults to 0.

Enabled.description: A boolean value to indicate whether the retention policy is enabled.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Categories.description: List of categories of the logs.

Locations.description: List of regions for which Activity Log events are stored or streamed.

Name.description:
The name of the Log Profile. Changing this forces a
new resource to be created.

ServicebusRuleId.description: The service bus (or event hub) rule ID of the service bus (or event hub) namespace in which the Activity Log is streamed to. At least one of `storage_account_id` or `servicebus_rule_id` must be set.

StorageAccountId.description: The resource ID of the storage account in which the Activity Log is stored. At least one of `storage_account_id` or `servicebus_rule_id` must be set.
